description: BF Helper lets you roll new characters and lookup spell and rule descriptions. Designed for use with the Basic Fantasy RPG. basicfantasy.org
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Basic Fantasy to roll a Thief.
Alexa, ask Basic Fantasy how Light works.
Alexa, ask Basic Fantasy about charging.
name: BF Helper
shortDescription: A companion Skill for Basic Fantasy RPG players.
